programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert has always dreamed of living in the woods. And Tilda thinks wishes like that should be fulfilled. So Tilda, Rupert and Molly set out to spend a night in the forest. Rupert is amused by all the luggage the ladies are taking with them – for him, the woods have everything one could need! He soon discovers that its not that easy...

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Eliott has read about a lot of world records: the world’s oldest person, the highest jump or even the longest beard! How incredible! The Triplets decide to break their very own record. However, it is easier said than done and it seems that pretty much all records have already been broken, which means that they are going to have to be extremely creative. Who knows, maybe they will break the silliness record?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Turbulent is quite upset! In a fit of jealousy, he accuses Mom of always serving more food to Poet than him. Mom decides to tell them the story of Boum and Baboum, two bear-cubs who were very jealous of each other and who decided to pay a visit to their Grandfather. One of them had a cake in his bag and, the other, a bottle of lemonade. During the walk, they got thirsty and hungry but found it impossible to come to an agreement and share their supplies. In the end, a fox ends up eating most of the cake... Leaving them barely anything. A good way to be cured of ones tendency to jealousy.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Woodsy has gone camping with Loudo and his father and Scoutbadger finds himself alone. Unexpectedly, Scoutbadger is unsettled by his twin’s absence. He is sure that being twins creates a special link between them and now senses that Woodsy is in great danger. He wants to find out what is happening.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Imagination Adventure: Sheriff Caillou and Deputy Clementine thwart Leo the Bandits train Robbery.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou wants a new video game and does chores to earn an allowance. But they all go a bit wrong.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Henry hears that the Fat Controller’s grandchildren have chickenpox, he starts to worry about whether engines can get chickenpox too. Then he meets Thomas who has been splattered with mud and is carrying a wagon of chickens, and becomes convinced of it! It seems like every engine Henry meets is splattered with something that looks like spots and it’s not until the end of the day that poor Henry discovers that chickenpox is not really a problem for engines after all!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: It’s time for the three trainees to move up to advanced training. Wilson joins the Chug Patrol rescue squad, Brewster teams up with the Chuggineer construction crew and Speed Fleet recruits super-fast Koko. When Koko finds herself in peril, Wilson rushes to her rescue and pulls her out of a collapsing mine tunnel, proving that he is a brave new hero of the rails.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: When Emery breaks down in the forest, it’s Chug Patroller Wilson to the rescue. Wilson uses his new skills to locate Emery with the aid of a flare and gets him back on track with a huge crane.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Charley’s mission this week is to ring the school bell. But when he is in the hallway by himself, he sees a strange little mysterious shadow… Could it be a ghost? Charley goes pale. His mission has all of a sudden become very stressful!!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty takes Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave to the beach, where they build a big sandcastle. They choose the right tools for the job and decorate it for the Beach King to live in. But what kind of creature is the Beach King and will he like his new home?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and his family arrive at the hamlet for their first day of vacation. Having been told by his parents that their stay will be packed with surprises, T’choupi has high expectations! But disappointment sets in fast: not only does he find the dog daunting, he also notices there’s no slide, or TV, or pool! This place is going to be sooo boring!!... Until he finds out there’s a girl his age living there. "Huh, where?!" T’choupi can’t wait to meet this mysterious potential playmate!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: When a Sunda slow loris lands in the garden, the Junior Rangers quickly learn that they have to return it to the wild. Will they manage to find the slow loris a home? Or will the slow loris end up as a snack for a hungry sun bear?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Mama Owls chicks are born, and soon they are strong enough for Berry and Dolly to visit them. Doctor Owl asks for their help while he works. The owl babies are very lively, and Berry and Dolly play with them enthusiastically and patiently. At lunchtime, Mama Owl is running out of patience, but eventually, they manage to feed the chicks. After finishing lunch and resting a little, the little ones regain their energy. They happily jump around Mama Owl, who feels it is time that the chicks learn to fly.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, plays beautifully on his violin for the forest inhabitants, but one day, no one listens to his new piece. First, he looks for Berry, Balthazar, and Stanley, but they are busy. He goes to Dolly, but she doesn’t have time either. Very discouraged, he decides to leave the forest. However, he meets the Magpie, who welcomes him and cheers him up. Meanwhile, the others begin to search for Alfonso. When they find him, they apologize and invite him to play his new piece at the playground opening.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One autumn day, Reggie Squirrel is visited by his old friend, Otto Badger, who brings a frisbee as a gift. They happily play with it, and when they head home, the frisbee falls at the base of a tree. Later, Berry and his friends find it and play with it, but Balthazar throws it so far that the frisbee vanishes. Reggie Squirrel asks them about it later, but Balthazar denies having seen it. Dolly and Flutter find the frisbee and bring it back to Reggie. Berry, feeling ashamed, admits that they accidentally threw the frisbee and couldnt find it. In the end, they all play happily with it until dark, carefully making sure not to throw it too far.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Leapy, the grasshopper girl, gets paint on her hair while painting her house in the spring. She can’t wash it off, so Zephyr, the dragonfly, offers to cut her hair. Leapy is very sad when she sees herself in the mirror; she doesn’t like her new hairstyle. At Zephyrs suggestion, they show the others, but only Dolly notices the change and compliments her. Later, they hold a hairstyle day, where everyone creates special hairstyles for themselves. Leapy happily finishes painting her house and invites her friends to a spring feast.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Stanleys birthday is approaching, and he becomes very curious and can’t wait to find out what gift he will receive from Dolly. He peeks into the ladybird girls drawer. The next day, he tells Balthazar that he knows what his gift will be. On his birthday, the friends gather and wish Stanley a happy birthday. Flutter presents the cake, they sing, and then Stanley blows out the candles and cuts the cake. Stanley receives many nice gifts, including a bowling set from Dolly. Stanley admits that he peeked into the ladybird girls drawer because he was curious about his gift.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: If youre very quiet and statue still, then the duckies will come. Today, Bing and Sula are at the park to feed the ducks. Sula is very good at standing still like a statue and only giving a small handful of food to the ducks when they come up to her. Bing, on the other hand, throws all the food into the water at once – not thinking that a big quacking goose will come along and eat it all in one bite!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing so Flop suggests they make a smoothie. When Bings carrot accidentally gets put in the blender, hes upset to disover he cant have it back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing finds a frog in the garden, so he and Sula make the frog a house in a bucket.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to play his car park game, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing it up.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play shadow tag until it starts raining and Bings shadow is outside getting wet.

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon wants to beat his record for juggling the soccer ball with his foot. Not easy with Gaspard who is always there, under foot! Boy, he’s just like sticky glue! Ah, Gaspard has to go to a birthday party and Simon breathes a huge sigh of relief. Whew, finally alone! Simon beats his juggling record but there’s no one around to see! Daddy is busy in the work shed and Mommy is on the phone with a colleague. Simon starts wishing that Gaspard were around! Boy does he ever miss him! And he starts counting the minutes until his little brother, “Mister Sticky Glue” gets back from his birthday party!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie, Scoutbadger, Woodsy and Berry decide to put on a show for their parents. They make a little theatre but Scoutbadger wants to control everything and thinks he is a star. His team quits and each one goes off to rehearse an act alone. Woodsy will juggle with plums, Rosie will walk on stilts and Berry will do acrobatics. Meanwhile, Scoutbadger rehearses his ‘one-badger show’ but finally goes hoarse…

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Its Little Field Mouses birthday and Little Nutbrown Hare wants to give her exactly the right gift. After a moment’s thought he realises he has no idea what to give her. Big Nutbrown Hare encourages his son to think about everything he knows about his friend. He remembers she likes to look nice on her birthday, so her makes her a lovely necklace and she is delighted!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare keeps winning a game with Little Field Mouse, and enjoys it so much he doesnt realise she is frustrated with losing. Big Nutbrown Hare helps him realise that winning is less important than making sure everyone enjoys playing the game. So Little Nutbrown Hare invents a new game that Little Field Mouse and her twin siblings can enjoy playing too.

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Annalee and Boribon are planning a trip, but Boribon isn’t feeling well. The little bears fever rises, and he has to stay in bed. Annalee takes care of him, so the days pass quickly. Thanks to all the care and medicine, Boribon soon gets well again!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Which child will get the big spoon for the annual fondue held in memory of the very first residents of th Mouse Mansion. Sam and Julia are in competition, will their friendship hold up?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia is angry with Sam who stepped on her tail. Sam hurt her and she lost her balance. Julia doesnt want to talk to him anymore! As best he can, Sam tries to make up with his friend.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: In Grandpa’s garden, Turbulent is fascinated by the super heroes’ stories he can read in his book. He wishes too to be a Kind Vigilante who saves the lovely and the helpless. Unfortunately, every time he tries to save someone, his sister who stucked her kite in a tree or his brother who is afraid of a spider for example, Grandpa always comes first and fixes the problem. When Turbulent was at the most discouraging point, a new villain appears ant kidnap all the people he loves, the Kind Vigilante is back in business!

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are playing in the park when Mommy calls them because it’s time to go home. When they arrive she asks them if Toto is not with them but the Triplets thought he was already with Mommy! What a disaster! Toto is lost! It’s the total panic, the Triplets are desperate and worst, the park is about to close! Everyone starts to look for Toto, Grandpa makes the tour of the neighborhood, Mommy hangs signs everywhere and calls the Police. We absolutely need to find him !

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Brewster is learning to use the mega-­‐chug crane, but his training time is cut short when they are called away to fix some damage in a mine tunnel. As they cross the old rickety bridge it collapses, leaving Zack stranded on the other side. How will they ever reach him? Brewster has an idea. The chuggers help him transport the mega-­‐chug crane up the steep mountain. It’s a tough challenge and they nearly don’t manage it, but Brewster is determined. He uses all his crane skills to lift Zack safely out of the high tunnel. Zack could not be prouder of his trainee.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Why Files (Norman and Hannah) investigate a mystery involving spilled milk, a half-eaten sausage roll, and strange ‘dog like’ footprints…

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When party celebrations go wrong and help is needed, Fireman Sam and his crew are here to save the day in Pontypandy.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Tiger is spending the night at Kippers house. They are on hedgehog watch but every time the hedgehog turns up, they are doing something else and dont see him. Then they find a bite taken out of a doughnut. Kipper knows he didnt do it. Tiger didnt do it. So who did?

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Tiger and Kipper go to the park to try out Tigers new roller blades. Tiger crashes and hurts his thumb. He tells Pig hes so badly injured that he cant use roller blades anymore and so Pig can borrow them. But Pig is quite happy on Kippers roller skates and does a ballet dance to show them.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is frustrated when he can’t score a basket in his new basketball hoop. After pretending he’s in charge of a space mission, guiding a shuttle pilot (Mommy) into a moon crater, Caillou learns to slow down and take a breath. This helps him finally score a basket!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: When Caillou cant get the steps right to a block party line dance, he worries he’ll ruin the dance for everyone. But Grandmas story about square dancing for a famous square dance caller (Caillou) helps Caillou overcome his anxiety and dance the night away.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: A little railway show comes to Sodor and a misunderstanding leads to all the small engines on railway turning up at Ulfstead Castle to participate.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers take a baby smooth-coated otter to the rainforest to find its home. Unfortunately, a group of hungry crocodiles have their eyes on the little otter.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo finds a playful young orangutan in his garden. With the orangutan in tow, the Junior Rangers travel to the Indonesian island of Sumatra to look for the orangutan’s mother.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat and Jess visit Wales to pick up a suit of armour and hear all about King Gilbertson!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: The lighthouse needs a new lightbulb delivered, but lightbulbs are delicate...

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma’s crèche, a talking ride on car. It seems like fun until Talkie Taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced Bing and Sula use their imagination to play a game they really want to play without being dictated to by the noisy taxi.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s a windy day and Bing wants to fly his Hoppity Voosh kite with Flop. And he wants to do it all by himself. Even when Pando arrives and wants to help Bing insists on doing it his way. When the kite gets caught up in the park bench Bing realises that there are some times when another pair of hands comes in handy.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s bath time and Bing just can’t help adding a few more quirts of bubble goo…and a few more….and a few more, until he gets more bubbles than he can handle.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing goes to play with Sula who is engrossed in a game of ‘sparkle magic’ when he arrives. Bing wants to play too but Sula finds all sorts of reasons why Bing can’t play with her special sparkly things. Amma suggests that Bing makes his own sparkle magic stone but disaster strikes when Bing accidentally spills Sula’s precious sparkle dust.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald inadvertently makes a date to watch TV with Henry at the same time that hes supposed to go swimming with Daisy. He tries to do both without telling his friends. But as he runs back and forth, he gets more and more mixed up, with hilarious results. Finally, he confesses the truth, and they decide to combine both activities so that they can all be together.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald goes out to get some cocoa and a newspaper for Henry, who has a bad case of the Arctic Sniffles. On the way, Oswald encounters his friends, who all prescribe different cures – soup, warm clothes, and cough drops. Oswald winds up laden down with the various remedies, and gets caught in a rainstorm as he staggers back home. By then Henry is feeling better, and Oswald is the one with the sniffles!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Mila is appearing on the children’s TV game show, “Whiz-A-Quiz”, the rest of the Spring City Rockets are disappointed that they didn’t get tickets to watch and support her. This gives Mayor Madison the idea for Bob to build an outdoor movie area at the Stadium where everyone can watch the game show together. But when Mayor Madison asks Lofty to help the Spring City Rockets decorate the stadium, he gets carried away and leaves Leo to finish the support frames for the giant screen all by himself. A job that is too big for one person. When the giant screen arrives, the frame isn’t sturdy enough to hold it and the whole structure starts falling apart. Lofty races in and saves the TV screen but the frame, stage and audience seating are broken.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: JJ and Mila are training for a snowboarding stunt show to be performed at the opening of the Winter in Spring Festival - a celebration of winter in Spring City. Bob and the team will be building a triple chairlift to transport passengers to the top of Observatory Hill. But Bob isn’t keen on the cold weather - he’d much prefer to be building sandcastles on the beach! During a work break, Skye offers Bob a snowboarding lesson - and he’s terrible! Meanwhile, Scoop is determined to have a slide down the snowy hill - but Wendy warns him that without snow chains, he’ll have no control. Scoop can’t resist... and ends up sliding all over the slope and crashing into a support beam, causing the chairlift cable to jump off the wheel tracks.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse go on a long trip with Big Nutbrown Hare to find some food he hid away during the warmer months. Little Nutbrown Hare plays with a stick along the way, which turns out to have many uses, one of which is helping them find the food and another is finding their way home again.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is very proud of a Christmas Tree he has built from pine cones. So proud, that when Little Field Mouse accidentally knocks it over he has trouble forgiving her. When he makes a mistake of his own, Big Nutbrown Hare forgives him immediately, and he understands how important it is to forgive.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game called ‘snow seek’. The friends have a lot of fun creating tracks for Little Nutbrown Hare to follow, but Little Redwood Fox’s tracks completely disappear and so does she. When Big Nutbrown Hare reports that Little Redwood Fox was sighted walking backwards, they work out how she managed to trick them all.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy likes football. What other things does Timmy like?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and the gang race all over Busytown trying to find the lock that fits and old key they found. They search everywhere from the Busytown Museum to Mr Gronkle’s antiques. They come up empty until they remember that an old roll top desk was being delivered to the antique store near where they found the key and had a lock on it. They try the key and it fits. / Chocolate sauce on Lowlys car leaves Huckle and the gang puzzled.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is throwing some awesome moves on the kitchen counter, dancing with his drink bottle in one hand. When he bounds into the garden and opens the drink, it fizzes out over the top and nearly all of it goes on the floor! He wonders why that happened, so he goes to Okido to find out! When he lands, Zoe and Felix are staring up at the sky because hundreds of birds are all flying in the same direction.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy is making a new jigsaw puzzle in his bedroom and it’s of a dinosaur. “I’d love to see a REAL dinosaur,” he says. He wonders why he’s never seen one… So off he goes to Okido! Messy lands in Zoe and Felix’s garden and cartwheels down the path to catch up with them. Zoe and Felix are carrying sandcastle equipment – Messy picks up Felix’s bucket and puts it on his head. “What’s this?” he asks, “A new hat?” Felix and Zoe laugh and invite him to come to the beach with them. Messy speeds off in excitement!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apple isnt paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling "Tall Tales." So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry decides to imitate his Mum by becoming a newspaper reporter for the day.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry is disappointed that he cant have what he wants for breakfast he goes to Dino-world.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A vervet monkey shows up as an uninvited guest to one of Leo’s picnics. The Junior Rangers head to the savannah to bring the monkey home, but the trip takes a nasty turn when they fall into an animal trap.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Toby stubbornly refuses to fill up with coal just because Henrietta keeps reminding him. He leaves her behind and sets off to take some trucks to the Scrapyard, but ends up running out of coal just as he gets there. Toby needs someone to stop and give him some coal, but is hard to see amongst all the scrap. Reg tries to help him be seen, but when the other engines do finally see Toby, they get the wrong idea and soon a rumour spreads across the island that the poor old Toby is being scrapped!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When railway inspectors come to the Island of Sodor, they start their inspection on Thomas’ branch line. Thomas, Annie and Clarabel are keen to show what they can do, but there are nothing but problems: a stuck window in a hot carriage, naughty schoolchildren pulling the emergency cable and animals on the line! To make matters worse one of the inspectors is very grumpy. But when Annie discovers that he’s left his gold watch on her seat, Thomas sets out to return it and that finally impresses the grumpy inspector more than anything.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: As every year, Maria is set to take part in the pizza contest. But she sprains her wrist at the last moment and, unable to cook, cant participate. So David asks Grisu to cook in her stead. Its the perfect mission for Grisu, who loves pizza (and his father even more). Maria instructs him – and Stella – on how to make the Pizza Nonna, according to her grandmothers recipe. But things go haywire, Grisu unwittingly ends up tied to the ceiling fan, spinning fast, kicking everything and making a mess in the kitchen, plus he burns the recipe. As all hope seems lost, Grisu, who never gives up, has Maria sing a lullaby, which makes her remember the recipe. Thanks to that, they make the best pizza ever and go on to win the contest.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Toramento has to decorate Dragontown with flowers for its yearly ball. But as he got the flowers delivered too late, he wont be able to finish his task on time. So David asks Grisu to help out Toramento and be his assistant gardener. The young dragon is in charge of making flowerbed depicting a volcano in the town square – even though Fume would rather have his son use cactuses instead of flowers. Things dont go exactly as planned. First, the soil is too hard, and then Thingy unearths most flowers Grisu and Stella have managed to plant.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It’s a fine Autumn day and it seems that all of the meadow creatures are out enjoying the sun. Little Nutbrown Hare is surprised that Big Nutbrown Hare knows every single creature in the meadow. He sets out to trick him into believing there is a brand new animal… called a ‘Grrr-umph’, which he cleverly creates out of shadows! Will Big Nutbrown Hare be tricked?

programme.title: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau : Dernières paroles
programme.desc: The great German baritone Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau was greatly admired for his interpretive insight, note-perfect control of the tonal qualities, and shadings of color in his voice, for exceptional rhythmic sense and impeccable diction. His reputation as a lieder singer is so high – he had a repertoire of more than 3.000 songs – that it is easy to forget his extensive list of operatic roles. In this conversation Fischer-Dieskau reveals for the last time on camera the secrets of his outstanding career. His ‘Last Words’ provide a deep insight into the extraordinary artistic life of one of the most famous and prolific lieder singers of our time. Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau died in May 2012 at the age of 86.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Yehudi Menuhin, le violon du siècle
programme.desc: Lord Yehudi Menuhin, relaxing at his home in the Greek isles, tells the story of his wonderful career on the eve of his 80th birthday. A wealth of rare archival material illustrates this highly informative and entertaining profile of the worlds greatest violinist, providing insight into the life of the young San Franciscan wonderchild, his sudden rise to stardom which led to an outstanding international career, his encounters with the worlds greatest musicians and music traditions, and his involvement in world politics.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Blixtar orsakar kaos i byggnader nar de slår ner. Över hela varlden sjunker stader av olika anledningar och torn kollapsar. En tunnelbanevagn i Mexico City och flera broar i Indien rasar. I Dallas blir en olycklig rivning en kopia av det lutande tornet i Pisa och en sensation på sociala medier. Vanliga manniskor visar upp sina MacGyver-fardigheter, vilket vacker frågan: geniala eller galna?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Vi avslojar Polens djarvaste tekniska underverk, ser en superhamn resa sig från havets djup, avslojar de anmarkningsvarda designhemligheterna bakom byggandet av EU:s hogsta byggnad, utforskar en vidstrackt underjordisk saltgruva och besoker varldens hogsta trakonstruktion, som ar 111 meter hog.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: WWII: Secrets From Above skildrar det andra varldskrigets mest hapnadsvackande handelser ur ett helt nytt perspektiv. Geno matt matcha fangslande bilder från fronten, sallan visade filmklipp och fantastiska flygrekognosceringsbilder och deras ursprungliga platser återskapar serien vitala slag, djarva bombrader och utvecklingen av varldens forsta massforstorelsevapen.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget från ovan
programme.desc: Året ar 1942. Hitler vill ha hamnd for de allierades obarmhartiga bombningar av tyska stader. I en hemlig forskningsanlaggning utvecklar hans forskare varldens forsta kryssnings- och ballistiska missiler. En katt- och råttalek med hoga insatser tar sin borjan, dar de allierade forsoker avsloja nazisternas hemligheter från luften. Kan de stoppa Hitler innan han får sin hamnd?

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Stora barriarrevet ar ett tropiskt paradis, men det har aven en mork sida. Arkeologer forsoker losa gåtan med Australiens egna "Titanic". Med hjalp av en fjarrstyrd undervattensfarkost tar vi oss ner till havsbottnen dar vi ser spår av revets våldsamma tillkomst och utveckling. Ett forlist brittiskt krigsfartyg från mitten av 1700-talet lankar revet till det okanda myteriet på Bounty.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz åker till Cambridge for att fixa till en alskad Range Rover Vouge SE från 1991, en pålitlig fyrhjulsdriven bil som sett sina basta dagar och nu behover lite extra karlek. Del 6:10.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: En BMW 2002 Turbo behover hjalp, men det ar uppenbart att den legendariska bilen kan bli snappet for svår att rusta upp.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Nar en hemlig sovjetisk ubåt med karnvapenbestyckade torpeder upptacks vara på vag mot Kuba attackeras den med "sjunkbomber for ovning", vilket narapå leder till krig.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Oktober 1944. Efter att ha tillerkants krigets forsta officiella ubåtssankning återkallas den tyske ubåtskaptenen Gunter Prien plotsligt från sitt patrulluppdrag. Han erbjuds ett hemligt uppdrag: att slå till mot brittiska Royal Navy hemmahamnen i Scapa Flow. Prien lyckas trotsa starka strommar och undgå blockadskeppen, men det garanterar inte att han kan ta sig hem igen efter sitt uppdrag.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Svartskagg; holjt i myter och intriger, ett namn synonymt med kaos. Hans stulna flaggskepp Queen Annes Revenge kryssar genom Karibien och får fart med en brokig besattning av pirater som soker jamlikhet, aventyr och skatter. Nar han lyckas blockera Charleston i South Carolina och kraver medicin till sin syfilissjuka besattning slutar jakten på Svartskagg med en blodig strid.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Utredarna soker genom vraket efter Turkish Air flight 1951 for att ta reda på varfor planet stortade.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Den 17 juli 2007: TAM Airlines Flight 054 ar på inflygning till Sao Paulos okanda Congonhas Airport. Landningsbana 35-L i Congonhas ar en av varldens mest forradiska. Den ar byggd på en kulle omgiven av hoga byggnader. Besattningen på Flight 3054 får en rapport om att banan ar våt och hal. Kapten Henrique Stephanini tar ner sin Airbus A320 vid banans borjan, aktiverar reversering och anvander bromsarna, men planet saktar inte ner. Det rusar nerfor banan, korsar en motorvag och stortar in i en byggnad och en bensinstation i narheten. Ingen på planet overlever. 12 personer på marken dodas också. Detta ar den varsta flygkatastrofen i Sydamerikas historia. Utredarna ar under enorm press for att undersoka vad som gick fel på en av Brasiliens mest trafikerade banor, innan den kraver fler liv.

programme.title: Egyptens solkung: Hemligheter och skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer upptacker att den forsta graven innehåller en kropp sedan Tutankhamon. Mumierna visar sig vara en prinsessa och en adelskvinna, samt ytterligare 30 mumier. Gradvis hittar man svaren på vilka de var och varfor de befinner sig har. Vilka var de då? Att losa pusslet kraver timmar av detektivarbete och den senaste tekniken for att pussla samman dessa mystiska gravars fantastiska bakgrund.

programme.title: Kinas dolda massgrav
programme.desc: Upptack hemligheterna som omsluter Kinas forsta kejsares grav dar Terrakottaarmen vaktar kusliga fynd som skriver om historien.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett postflyg stortar i Lapplandsfjallen. I takt med att haveriutredarna fogar samman pusselbitarna uppenbarar sig en mork och skrammande bild av kaos och forvirring.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter en rutinlandning skakas ett taiwanesiskt plan av en kraftig explosion. Hela flygplanskroppen tillintetgors i eldinfernot. Den internationella haverigruppen hittar inga spår av en bomb ombord men efter en grundlig undersokning av de utbranda resterna visar det sig att ingredienserna till katastrofen låg dolda i ett forvaringsfack.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Ännu en karv vinter lider mot sitt slut och raddningsarbetarna åker upp till bergen for att återuppleva några av sasongens mest vågade uppdrag.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord riskerar livet for att hålla vagarna oppna nar en vinterstorm slår till. Jo Roger och hans son Ole Henrik tvingas hantera enorma mangder sno.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Blixtar orsakar kaos i byggnader nar de slår ner. Över hela varlden sjunker stader av olika anledningar och torn kollapsar. En tunnelbanevagn i Mexico City och flera broar i Indien rasar. I Dallas blir en olycklig rivning en kopia av det lutande tornet i Pisa och en sensation på sociala medier. Vanliga manniskor visar upp sina MacGyver-fardigheter, vilket vacker frågan: geniala eller galna?

programme.title: Inside Airport Lost and Found
programme.desc: Folj farden med de forlorade prylarna, från att återforenas på Seattles flygplats till att bli återtagna på Unclaimed Baggage Center eller utauktionerade på Pittsburghs flygplats.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: På Australiens mest trafikerade flygplats, som ar i drift dygnet runt, stoppar ett stromavbrott all verksamhet och resursansvarige Andrew forsoker återstalla strommen inom en timme. Flygledaren Melissa hanterar upp till 700 flygningar per dag. Ett flyg måste tomma sin bransletank och återvanda till flygplatsen efter start på grund av ett fel på motorn.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Nar Alaska Airlines Flight 261 plotsligt kraschar ner I Stilla havet finner utredarna ett kritiskt underhållsproblem med dodliga konsekvenser.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Curly får hora att ett stort trad riskerar att falla på ett hus i området. Mary ger sig ut på en outtrottlig jakt efter brasved.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Mary drar till skogs for att jaga svartbjorn for forsta gången. Gary forsoker fånga en baver. Hans och Timbi går upp i bergen for att samla ved.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer graver ut den outforskade gravkammaren i en gammal pyramid i hopp om att hitta den 4 400 år gamla kungens mumie och hans skatter. Ingen modern arkeolog har till fullo utforskat Sahurepyramiden som har drabbats av en katastrofal kollaps inuti. Dr Mohamed Ismail Khaled och hans team tar sig an den farliga uppgiften att roja undan rasmassorna och gor upptackter for livet.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer jagar ledtrådar som kan kasta ljus over livet och doden i det forna Egyptens forlorade megastad – Alexandria. De upptacker en krock mellan civilisationer nar de graver upp ett enormt hus for de doda. I stadens utkanter bryter de sig in i en intakt grav for att lara sig hur vanliga invånare behandlade sina doda nar Egyptens sista faraoner byggde sin praktfulla huvudstad.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Nogales hittar kokain I stotfångaren på en bil som anlander från Mexiko, och CBP Atlanta stoppar en kvinna som smugglar valpar från Brasilien.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP konfronterar manniskosmuggling vid gransovergången San Ysidro, medan HSI stoppar en bil lastad med 6 kilo fentanylpiller på vag till Kalifornien.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Berattelsen om Svarta ar spackad av hemligheter, legender och stora imperier. Fartyg har seglat dar i tusentals år. Dar det ar som djupast finns inget liv, vilket gjort att forlista skepp har ar valbevararade. I de har avsnittet undersoker vi dess havsbotten och hittar spår av en gammal gåta, om hur en hel flotta kunde gå under på bara 30 minuter. Dessutom hittar vi en av Hitlers forlorade ubåtar.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: En BMW 2002 Turbo behover hjalp, men det ar uppenbart att den legendariska bilen kan bli snappet for svår att rusta upp.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz beger sig ut på landsbygden i Wales for att radda en Vauxhall Astra GTE åt f.d. racerforaren Huw. Tyvarr har Huw drabbats av kroniska hjarntumorer hela hans vuxna liv, vilket inneburit att han tvingats låta sin alskade GTE stå i 20 år, men hans karlek till bilen gjorde att han aldrig sålde den.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Oktober 1944. Efter att ha tillerkants krigets forsta officiella ubåtssankning återkallas den tyske ubåtskaptenen Gunter Prien plotsligt från sitt patrulluppdrag. Han erbjuds ett hemligt uppdrag: att slå till mot brittiska Royal Navy hemmahamnen i Scapa Flow. Prien lyckas trotsa starka strommar och undgå blockadskeppen, men det garanterar inte att han kan ta sig hem igen efter sitt uppdrag.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: September 1939. Den tyske ubåtskaptenen Fritz-Julius Lemps liv tar en dramatisk vandning nar han trotsar Hitlers order och av misstag sanker passagerarfartyget SS Athenia med en torpedsalva. Arbetet att stoppa brittiska skepp och flygplan på vagen over Atlanten blir ett standigt bryderi for Lemp och dessutom måste han gora allt for att stoppa USA från att ge sig in i kriget.

programme.title: Pirates: Behind the Legends
programme.desc: Den okanda piratstaden Nassau kommer snart att skakas av engelsmannens hårda tag mot laglosheten i Karibien. Det ar har som Anne Bonny overger ett konventionellt liv for att bli kvinnlig pirat tillsammans med sin alskare Calico Jack. De får snart sallskap av Mary Read och bildar en besvarlig trio tills de tillfångatas av piratjagare och stalls infor ratta for sjoroveri.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Den 17 juli 2007: TAM Airlines Flight 054 ar på inflygning till Sao Paulos okanda Congonhas Airport. Landningsbana 35-L i Congonhas ar en av varldens mest forradiska. programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: 160 manniskor dog nar West Caribbean Airways Flight 708 stortade 2005. Olyckan ledde till att det problemfyllda flygbolaget gick i konkurs.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Nya officerare påborjar en elitutbildning till stridspiloter, men endast ett fåtal kommer att klara utbildningen. De kampar med precisionsbombning och utsatts for hårda bedomningar av instruktorerna.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Att landa på ett hangarfartyg – en viktig fardighet for alla stridspiloter i den amerikanska flottan – kraver absolut precision. Nar eleverna står infor den langsta och mest kravande fasen av utbildningen vet de att detta test kommer att avgora deras framtid i cockpit. Under den okande pressen borjar vissa vackla, vilket leder till en skarp varning från befalhavaren.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter en rutinlandning skakas ett taiwanesiskt plan av en kraftig explosion. Hela flygplanskroppen tillintetgors i eldinfernot. Den internationella haverigruppen hittar inga spår av en bomb ombord men efter en grundlig undersokning av de utbranda resterna visar det sig att ingredienserna till katastrofen låg dolda i ett forvaringsfack.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Tat dimma och annu tatare forvirring får en DC-9:a att hamna på fel anda av en trafikerad landningsbana i Detroit - på kollisionskurs med en ankommande 727:a. Åtta personer mister livet i den ohyggliga kraschen. Nar haveriutredarna tittar narmare på besattningens bakgrund vacks frågan om piloternas personligheter kan ha spelat en avgorande roll for den katastrofala handelseutvecklingen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord riskerar livet for att hålla vagarna oppna nar en vinterstorm slår till. Jo Roger och hans son Ole Henrik tvingas hantera enorma mangder sno.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord utvidgar sitt territorium, och med ny mark foljer nya hinder. Det blir en dålig dag for Ole Henrik nar en agglastbil fastnar i snon.

programme.title: Lost Ships of WW2
programme.desc: Petrel-teamet soker efter det amerikanska hangarfartyget USS Hornet. Doolittle-raden startade från dess dack for att hamnas Pearl Harbor. Men sex månader senare fick fartyget ett kort liv nar Hornet seglade in i ett svarm av japanska fartyg.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: Maj 1941: Bismarck, ett skrackinjagande nytt nazistiskt slagskepp, satter segel mot Atlanten med uppdrag att forstora de allierades forsorjningsfartyg. Det ar upp till den brittiska hemmaflottan, ledd av flaggskeppet HMS Hood, att stoppa slagskeppet innan det når Atlanten och andrar andra varldskrigets gång. Berattat från ett unikt flygperspektiv ar detta jakten på Bismarck.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Studenterna narmar sig mittpunkten av sin utbildning, och de ikoniska luftstriderna borjar. Deras erfarna instruktorer har hundratals flygtimmar bakom sig. For att klara testerna måste motståndaren overlistas och ett "dodande skott" avfyras. En student kanner pressen av att flyga med sin kommendorkapten, medan en annan måste tygla sina aggressiva instrinkter.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter en Boeing 727:s narapå dodliga kraschlandning over Michigan riskerar utredarna sina egna liv for att ta reda på varfor TWA Flight 841 kraschade.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna i Port Protection tar alltid hand om sina alskade hundkompisar. Troy och Sarah forsoker få tag på laxgodis till Brutus, Veronica och Carl bygger en ramp for att hjalpa gamle Sancho att ta sig fram med sina dåliga hofter, Oliver och Bree skapar en gångvag runt sitt flottarhus for Belle och Tigger, och Curly tar med Junior på andjakt.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Hans och Timbi bygger ett vaxthus. Sam letar efter material for att bygga en ugn. Curly tar med Amanda for att visa hur man samlar brasved.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer utforskar dolda gravar for att avkoda fornegyptiska forestallningar om livet efter doden. I Oxyrhynchus avslojar en forseglad sarkofag sina hemligheter for att visa upp en fantastiskt bevarad målad mumie. Och hogt uppe i bergen vid Philadelphia vågar sig ett team ner i ett 40 meter djupt schakt på jakt efter en sedan lange forlorad gravkammare.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer hittar ledtrådar om en mystisk faraodynasti, kallad Solkungarna, som regerade 1000 år fore Tutankhamun. Genom att utforska pyramider, ta sig ner i ett 14 meter långt schakt och stå ansikte mot ansikte med en 4000 år gammal mumie avslojar experterna hur solkungarna forandrade det egyptiska samhallet, fornyade religionen och forandrade Egypten for alltid.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP konfronterar manniskosmuggling vid gransovergången San Ysidro, medan HSI stoppar en bil lastad med 6 kilo fentanylpiller på vag till Kalifornien.

programme.title: Folkefest på Slottsplassen
programme.desc: Sensommermagi med Oslo-Filharmonien, fiolinvirtuos Ragnhild Hemsing, og sangfenomenet Jasmin White. Programledere Tarjei Strøm og Adelina Ibishi.

programme.title: Ukjent arving: Sverige
programme.desc: Mark reiser til Bulgaria for å leite etter nokon som skal få ein svimlande sum etter velgjeraren Simeon Genov.

programme.title: Sprek med Sofia
programme.desc: Ja, takk – begge deler!

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Den gamle brakka skal bort. Det gir nye muligheter – og bedre utsikt. Rødbetene skal opp, men avlingen er dårlig. Til gjengjeld er søtpotetene enorme.

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Frank har mistet yndlingsanorakken sin, så nå vil han sy en ny – i nøye utvalgt stoff. Mens han rengjør brostein, dukker det opp ei mystisk renne.

programme.title: Side om Side
programme.desc: Jonas får ny stilling på Granli skole, men får en sjalusibombe i fanget. Lisbeth og Frode blir invadert av en våryr Britt, og Celine sliter med å få datteren sin til å smile. Heldigvis for henne får hun hjelp av Silje og Gullestad.

programme.title: Sprek med Sofia
programme.desc: Ja, takk – begge deler!

programme.title: Beat for Beat
programme.desc: Artistene som skal konkurrere er Lollo Gardmann og Kirsti Lucena Medalle Andersen mot Ole Morten Aagenæs og Jon Niklas Rønning. Programleder er Atle Pettersen.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Ein gammal skule i Vaxholm er gjort om til bustad. Huset rommar mange spennande historier.

programme.title: Interiørarkitektens svenske hjem
programme.desc: Interiørarkitekt, kunstner og scenograf Streijffert elsker tak. Bli med til hennes fantastiske loft med utsikt over Stockholm.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: Gutta har lenge drømt om Nordland på langs, men vil starte på sjøen. Derfor prøver de noe de ikke har gjort før; å starte i hver sin lille seilbåt.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: Det gode livet på sjøen fortsetter, selv om det pene været er i ferd med å forsinke hele ekspedisjonen. Men vi skal snart få væromslag.

programme.title: Bakemesterskapet
programme.desc: Brød og sirkus! Og Afrika og tivoli og Finse. Alt kan være inspirasjon når et byggverk skal reises – av brød.

programme.title: Stoltenberg i møte med krigen
programme.desc: Krigen i Ukraina raser, og NATO-sjef Stoltenberg lover Zelenskyj å stå ved Ukraina så lenge det kreves. Samtidig lover han kona, Ingrid, å komme hjem.

programme.title: Munter mat
programme.desc: Det blir terriner og pateer i ulike former fra brødrene Prices hånd denne gangen: Fransk landpate, dansk terrine av svineskank med karamellisert sjalottløk og 70-tallsklassikeren lakseterrine.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Hygge i hagen
programme.desc: Pernilla drøymer stort for den nye garden, men John kjem kjapt i gang med dyrkinga. Tareq finn etelege urtar, og Malin bygger takvindauge.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Ein gammal skule i Vaxholm er gjort om til bustad. Huset rommar mange spennande historier.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Ein gammal rival av Ventress er komen tilbake til Aidensfield saman med kona si. Vernon organiserer missekonkurransen "Frøken Aidensfield".

programme.title: Amanda og Alans italienske rønne
programme.desc: Amanda bringer et lite stykke Hollywood til Sicilia når hun pusser opp hovedsoverommet.

programme.title: Ville familier
programme.desc: Om du er veps i England, gepard i Kenya eller guanaco i Patagonia – åpne sletter byr på både utfordringer og muligheter for den som vil fø opp unger.

programme.title: Afrika med Afua
programme.desc: I Kenya møter Afua et forholdsvis ungt land med både stor urban utbygging og mye uberørt utmark.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Det er sommer på Holmlia, og bestekompisene Benjamin og Elias drømmer om alt livet kan by på. Et halvt år senere blir alle drømmer knust.

programme.title: Etter Benjamin
programme.desc: Benjamins død sender sjokkbølger gjennom Holmlia. Hjemme sitter en knust mor, mens ungdommene samles i sinne og sorg. Alle unntatt Elias.

programme.title: Sau
programme.desc: Sommeren er i gang. Sauene skal til fjells og slåttonna står for tur. Og midt i alt arbeidet rømmer både biene og sauene.

programme.title: Låtskrivern
programme.desc: Intimkonsert fra Rockheim i Trondheim med den folkekjære artisten og låtskriveren Ole Paus. Programleder er Tor Andersen.

programme.desc: Eit ungt par flyttar til Aidensfield. Dei ventar barn og ønskjer seg eit fredeleg liv på landet, men det blir ikkje berre idyll.

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Frank bruker en metode han har lært i Wales til å lage innhegninger av hekk. Og så reiser han til Holland for inspirasjon.

programme.title: Det gode bondeliv
programme.desc: Storken kommer på besøk hvert år, men flyr videre. I et håp om at de skal hekke, renoverer Frank redet. Siste års Bramley-epler blir til eplemos.

programme.title: Side om Side
programme.desc: Gullestad reiser bort og får Jonas og Frode til å steppe inn som velvikarer. Det skulle han ikke ha gjort. Celine kjeder seg som hjemmeværende mor og jobber hardt for å få tilbake et voksenliv. Heldigvis har hun Silje og Lisbeth.

programme.title: Sprek med Sofia
programme.desc: Sofia viser øvelser som styrker kjernemuskulaturen.

programme.title: Beat for Beat
programme.desc: OBS: Her er det publikum i studio fordi programmet er tatt opp før koronaberedskapsnivået ble hevet. Artister: Eirik Søfteland og Ingeborg Walther mot Torstein Flakne og Ulrikke Brandstorp.

programme.title: Det sit i veggane
programme.desc: Kong Gustaf VI Adolf hadde sin "studenthybel" på et slott ved elva Fyrisån i Uppsala. Har han etterlatt seg noen spor?

programme.title: Interiørarkitektens svenske hjem
programme.desc: Blomstrende, fargerikt og fantasifullt er stikkord for Brudnizkis hjem i England. I sin egen design bærer han med seg sin svenske arv.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: Nordlandsfjellene er ville og vakre, men gutta ligger bak skjema og må gjennomføre lange dagsmarsjer. For en av dem får det alvorlige konsekvenser.

programme.title: Monsen, Monsen og Mattis
programme.desc: En ambisiøs ekspedisjonsplan, 24 hunder og tre isfiskere i konkurransemodus.

programme.title: Bakemesterskapet
programme.desc: Bake kake søte, dyppe den i ... brød? Semifinalen blir ekstra utfordrende når deltakerne må blande kake og bakst, og finne opp noe helt nytt.

programme.title: Jakten på Norvegium
programme.desc: Norsk dokumentar fra 2018. I 1879 trodde Norges første malmgeolog Tellef Dahll at han hadde oppdaget en verdenssensasjon: Et nytt og kanskje verdifullt grunnstoff. Men det ble fiasko. Andre geologer slo snart fast at det Dahll kalte "Norvegium" slett ikke var noe grunnstoff. Så ble det hele glemt. Nesten. Helt til en av vår tids amatørgeologer går i land på en liten øy i Kragerøskjærgården.

programme.title: Munter mat
programme.desc: Mallorca var brødrene Prices ferieparadis som barn. I en hyllest til det dansk-spanske 70-tallskjøkken serverer de tapas, ibericoskinke, paella, helstekt pattegris og selvsagt sangria i bøtter og spann.

programme.title: Med hjartet på rette staden
programme.desc: Eit ungt par flyttar til Aidensfield. Dei ventar barn og ønskjer seg eit fredeleg liv på landet, men det blir ikkje berre idyll.

programme.title: Sørstatene med Griff

programme.desc: Ukens Extra-trekning fra Norsk Tippings studio på Hamar.

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie run into Father McAndrew at the fish market. They exchange pleasantries and as they are parting ways, Father McAndrew tells them that he would love to see them in church sometime. Unsure of how to decline politely, the Heffernans instead agree to attend Sundays services. During the service, Carrie reflects on the one thing that she really needs help with – a raise. Miraculously, the following day, Carrie receives word that her prayers have been answered and that she is getting her raise. Much to Dougs dismay, Carries prayers turn to more frivolous things – like shoe sales. He does his best to convince her that God would never approve of her prayers, but soon enough Carrie catches Doug praying for the Jets to win their latest football game. Meanwhile, Arthur hosts an open house in order to sell the house. Unfortunately, he hasnt mentioned a word of his efforts to Doug or Carrie, the homeowners.
